name: English (GB)
ARE_YOU_SURE_PROMPT: Are you sure you want to perform this action?
ARE_YOU_SURE_PROMPT_DESTRUCTIVE: Are you sure you want to perform this action? This action cannot be reversed.
SETTINGS_NOT_FOUND: There is no existing override created under the name **{name}**.
PLEASE_PROVIDE_VALID_LIST_CHANNELS: Please provide a valid list of channels.
PLEASE_PROVIDE_VALID_LIST_ROLES: Please provide a valid list of roles.
PLEASE_PROVIDE_VALID_LIST_EMOJIS: Please provide a valid list of emojis.
SUCCESS_CREATE_SETTINGS: Successfully created an override **{name}** that only applies {type, select, channel {to {channels, plural, =1 {1 channel} other {# channels}}} channelType {to messages in the specified type of channels} emoji {when one of the specified {emojis, plural, =1 {1 emoji} other {# emojis}} are used} role {when the message author has one of the specified {roles, plural, =1 {1 role} other {# roles}}}}.
SUCCESS_CREATE_SETTINGS_CHANNELS_NOTICE: This override also only applies in {channels, plural, =1 {1 channel} other {# channels}}.
CONFIRMATION_DELETE_SETTINGS:
Are you sure you want to delete **{name}**?
You will lose all configurations made specifically on this override, and they will be gone forever. No starred messages or other stats will be erased.
CONFIRMATION_RESET_SERVER_SETTINGS:
Are you sure you want to reset the server settings?
You will lose all configurations made specifically on the server settings, and they will be gone forever, but no created overrides will be deleted. No starred messages or other stats will be erased.
CONFIRMATION_RESET_CREATED_SETTINGS:
Are you sure you want to reset **{name}**?
You will lose all configurations made specifically on this override, and they will be gone forever, but the override itself will not be deleted. No starred messages or other stats will be erased.
SUCCESS_RESET_SETTINGS: Successfully reset {name, select, null {the server settings} other {**{name}**}}.
SUCCESS_CREATE_EMOJI_SETTINGS_NOTICE: Please note that this override will only take effect for an emoji if the **Emoji** setting is set to that emoji. Right now, no settings have the **Emoji** setting set to {emojis}.
SETTINGS_APPLY_CHANNELS: This override applies to messages in {other, plural, =0 {{channels}} other {{channels} and # other channels}}.
SETTINGS_APPLY_CHANNEL_TYPES: This override applies to messages in: {type}
SETTINGS_APPLY_ROLES: This override applies to messages where the author has {other, plural, =0 {{roles}} other {{roles} and # other roles}}{channels, select, null {} other { in {channels}}}.
SETTINGS_APPLY_EMOJIS: This override applies when reacting with {emojis}{channels, select, null {} other { in {channels}}}.
PLEASE_PROVIDE_CONTEXT_SETTINGS_TEST: Please provide a channel, role or emoji to use to test.
CANNOT_SEND_MESSAGES_IN_CHANNEL: I cannot send messages in {channel}, please enable the `Send Messages` permission.
CANNOT_SEND_EMBEDS_IN_CHANNEL: I cannot send embeds in {channel}, please enable the `Embed Links` permission.
CANNOT_VIEW_CHANNEL: I cannot view {channel}, please enable the `View Channel` permission.
CANNOT_VIEW_VOICE_CHANNEL: I cannot view {channel}, please enable the `View Channel` and the `Connect` permissions.
CANNOT_READ_HISTORY_IN_CHANNEL: I cannot read message history in {channel}, please enable the `Read Message History` permission.
PLEASE_PROVIDE_CHANGES: Please provide the changes you would like to make.
MISSING_ATTACH_FILES_PERMISSION_NOTICE: The bot is missing the `Attach Files` permission in {channel}, so media and files that are supposed to be reuploaded due to the **Reupload Attachments** setting will be linked instead.
REQUIRED_STARS_CLASH_SET: Because the value of **Required Stars** has to be higher than **Required Stars To Remove**, I've set **Required Stars** to {requiredStars, number} and **Required Stars To Remove** to {requiredToRemove, number}.
UNUSABLE_REACTION_EMOJIS_PROVIDED: I cannot use the emojis {emojis}. Please choose emojis from servers I am in.
TOO_MANY_EMOJIS: You have reached the maximum amount of emojis allowed for one server.
UPVOTE_DOWNVOTE_EMOJIS_CLASH: You cannot set the same emoji to star messages and downvote messages.
SETTING_ONLY_FOR_SERVER_SETTINGS: The setting **{setting}** can only be modified when editing Server Settings.
SETTINGS_EDIT_INVALID_CHANGE_ON_INVALID_: You cannot make those changes on this type of override.
SETTINGS_PRIORITY_NOW: This override now has a priority value of `{priority}`.
SETTINGS_NOW_INHERITS: This override now inherits settings from **{name}**.
NO_SETTINGS_APPLIED: No overrides are appplied when in the provided scenario.

SETTINGS.NAME: settings
SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: View all available settings or make edits.

MAIN.NAME: main
MAIN.DESCRIPTION: Edit the main settings, such as where starred messages go or how many stars are needed.

SETTINGS.NAME: override
SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: The override to make changes to.

REQUIRED_STARS.NAME: required-stars
REQUIRED_STARS.DESCRIPTION: Number of stars required to reach the starboard.

REQUIRED_STARS_TO_REMOVE.NAME: required-stars-to-remove
REQUIRED_STARS_TO_REMOVE.DESCRIPTION: Drop below this and get removed from the starboard.

EMOJIS.NAME: emojis
EMOJIS.DESCRIPTION: The emojis used to add stars to messages.

DOWNVOTE_EMOJIS.NAME: downvote-emojis
DOWNVOTE_EMOJIS.DESCRIPTION: The emojis used to downvote messages.

FILTERING.NAME: filtering
FILTERING.DESCRIPTION: Edit settings related to filtering starred messages, such as allowing self stars.

SETTINGS.NAME: override
SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: The override to make changes to.

FILTER_BOTS.NAME: filter-bots
FILTER_BOTS.DESCRIPTION: Filter messages by bots off the starboard.

SELF_STARS.NAME: self-stars
SELF_STARS.DESCRIPTION: Allow users to star their own messages.

FILTER_BLACKLISTED_USERS.NAME: filter-blacklisted-users
FILTER_BLACKLISTED_USERS.DESCRIPTION: Filter messages by blacklisted users off the starboard.

REMOVE_INVALID_REACTIONS.NAME: remove-invalid-reactions
REMOVE_INVALID_REACTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Remove invalid reactions, reactions on messages that shouldn't be starred.

APPEARANCE.NAME: appearance
APPEARANCE.DESCRIPTION: Edit settings related to how the starboard message looks.

SETTINGS.NAME: override
SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: The override to make changes to.

MESSAGE_JUMP_LINK.NAME: message-jump-link
MESSAGE_JUMP_LINK.DESCRIPTION: How the link to jump to the original message should be displayed.

NAME_DISPLAY.NAME: name-display
NAME_DISPLAY.DESCRIPTION: How user's names should be displayed on starboard messages.

MAX_CONTENT_DISPLAYED.NAME: max-content-displayed
MAX_CONTENT_DISPLAYED.DESCRIPTION: The maximum number of characters of the original message's content to display.

MAX_MEDIA_DISPLAYED.NAME: max-media-displayed
MAX_MEDIA_DISPLAYED.DESCRIPTION: The maximum amount of images/videos/files displayed, the rest being linked instead.

MAX_EMBEDS_DISPLAYED.NAME: max-embeds-displayed
MAX_EMBEDS_DISPLAYED.DESCRIPTION: The maximum amount of embeds the bot should display for starboard messages.

MAX_OVERALL_MESSAGE_LENGTH.NAME: max-overall-message-length
MAX_OVERALL_MESSAGE_LENGTH.DESCRIPTION: The maximum number of characters displayed on the starboard message in total.

REUPLOAD_ATTACHMENTS.NAME: reupload-attachments
REUPLOAD_ATTACHMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Reupload videos and files with the starboard message, instead of just appending as links.

MENTION_AUTHOR.NAME: mention-author
MENTION_AUTHOR.DESCRIPTION: Mention users on their starboard messages.

DISPLAY_AVATAR.NAME: display-avatar
DISPLAY_AVATAR.DESCRIPTION: Display user avatars on starboard messages.

DISPLAY_REPLIED_MESSAGE.NAME: display-replied-message
DISPLAY_REPLIED_MESSAGE.DESCRIPTION: Always display the message that is being replied to, if any.

USE_ORIGINAL_EMBED_COLOR.NAME: use-original-embed-colour
USE_ORIGINAL_EMBED_COLOR.DESCRIPTION: If an embed with colour is starred, use the original colour on the starboard message.

USE_LINKS_OVER_BUTTONS.NAME: use-links-over-buttons
USE_LINKS_OVER_BUTTONS.DESCRIPTION: For linking videos and other files, use blue text links instead of grey button links.

MISC.NAME: misc
MISC.DESCRIPTION: Edit miscellaneous settings that are useful but fall under no real category.

SETTINGS.NAME: override
SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: The override to make changes to.

ON_DELETION.NAME: when-deleted
ON_DELETION.DESCRIPTION: What to do when a moderator deletes a starboard message.

LINK_DELETES.NAME: sync-message-deletes
LINK_DELETES.DESCRIPTION: Delete the starboard message when the original is deleted.

KEEP_OLD_REWARD_ROLES.NAME: keep-old-reward-roles
KEEP_OLD_REWARD_ROLES.DESCRIPTION: Keep old reward roles when a new reward role is achieved.

LINK_EDITS.NAME: sync-message-edits
LINK_EDITS.DESCRIPTION: Update the starboard message when the original message is edited.

SETTINGS.NAME: settings
SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: The settings you want to view - an override or the server settings.

RESET.NAME: reset
RESET.DESCRIPTION: Reset the settings you've configured back to their defaults.

SETTINGS.NAME: settings
SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: The settings you want to reset - an override or the server settings.

OVERRIDES.NAME: overrides
OVERRIDES.DESCRIPTION: Manage overrides made for specific scenarios.

CREATE.NAME: create
CREATE.DESCRIPTION: Create an override for a specific scenario.

CHANNEL.NAME: channel
CHANNEL.DESCRIPTION: Create a channel override for specific channels.

NAME.NAME: name
NAME.DESCRIPTION: The name you want to give this new override.

SYNC_WITH.NAME: inherit-from
SYNC_WITH.DESCRIPTION: The override you create will inherit settings and copy changes from this existing override.

PRIORITY.NAME: priority
PRIORITY.DESCRIPTION: High priority overrides will be used before lower priority overrides. (default: 0)

CHANNELS.NAME: channels
CHANNELS.DESCRIPTION: The channels this override should be applied in.

CHANNEL_TYPE.NAME: channel-type
CHANNEL_TYPE.DESCRIPTION: Create a channel-type override for specific types of channels.

NAME.NAME: name
NAME.DESCRIPTION: The name you want to give this new override.

SYNC_WITH.NAME: inherit-from
SYNC_WITH.DESCRIPTION: The override you create will inherit settings and copy changes from this existing override.

PRIORITY.NAME: priority
PRIORITY.DESCRIPTION: High priority overrides will be used before lower priority overrides. (default: 0)

CHANNEL_TYPES.NAME: channel-types
CHANNEL_TYPES.DESCRIPTION: The types of channels this override should be applied in.

ROLE.NAME: role
ROLE.DESCRIPTION: Create a role override that get applied when the message author has specific roles.

NAME.NAME: name
NAME.DESCRIPTION: The name you want to give this new override.

SYNC_WITH.NAME: inherit-from
SYNC_WITH.DESCRIPTION: The override you create will inherit settings and copy changes from this existing override.

PRIORITY.NAME: priority
PRIORITY.DESCRIPTION: High priority overrides will be used before lower priority overrides. (default: 0)

ROLES.NAME: roles
ROLES.DESCRIPTION: The roles the message author must have one of for this override to apply.

CHANNELS.NAME: channels
CHANNELS.DESCRIPTION: The channels the message must also be in for this override to apply.

EMOJI.NAME: emoji
EMOJI.DESCRIPTION: Create an emoji override for specific emojis.

NAME.NAME: name
NAME.DESCRIPTION: The name you want to give this new override.

SYNC_WITH.NAME: inherit-from
SYNC_WITH.DESCRIPTION: The override you create will inherit settings and copy changes from this existing override.

PRIORITY.NAME: priority
PRIORITY.DESCRIPTION: High priority overrides will be used before lower priority overrides. (default: 0)

EMOJIS.NAME: emojis
EMOJIS.DESCRIPTION: This override will only apply when these emojis are used.

CHANNELS.NAME: channels
CHANNELS.DESCRIPTION: The channels the message must also be in for this override to apply.

DELETE.NAME: delete
DELETE.DESCRIPTION: Delete an override you've previously created.

SETTINGS.NAME: override
SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: The name of the override you want to delete.

EDIT.NAME: edit
EDIT.DESCRIPTION: Edit info about an override, such as the name or where it is applied.

NAME.NAME: name
NAME.DESCRIPTION: The new name for this override.

CHANNELS.NAME: channels
CHANNELS.DESCRIPTION: Provide every channel to set, or provide +#channel / -#channel to add/remove from the existing list.

CHANNEL_TYPES.NAME: channel-types
CHANNEL_TYPES.DESCRIPTION: The type of channels this override should now be applied in.

EMOJIS.NAME: emojis
EMOJIS.DESCRIPTION: The full list of emojis that this override should now be applied for.

ROLES.NAME: roles
ROLES.DESCRIPTION: Provide the full list of roles or provide +@role or -@role to add or remove from the existing list.

PRIORITY.NAME: priority
PRIORITY.DESCRIPTION: The priority this override should now have.

SYNC_WITH.NAME: inherit-from
SYNC_WITH.DESCRIPTION: The override that this override should now inherit settings and copy changes from.

TEST.NAME: test
TEST.DESCRIPTION: Test settings you've created in a provided context, and the order they're applied to.

CHANNEL.NAME: channel
CHANNEL.DESCRIPTION: The channel that the message would be in.

ROLES.NAME: roles
ROLES.DESCRIPTION: The role the message author would have. Provide a user to test with all their roles.

EMOJI.NAME: emoji
EMOJI.DESCRIPTION: The emoji that would be used to react.
